title: How Terrible were the Capitol Riots?
description:
NOTE: I have some verbal errors and inconsistencies in this video, forgive those in advance. 

What happened on January 6, 2021, was absolutely disgusting. Some thoughts on what happened. 

ALSO, if it was not clear, Trump can say there would be an orderly transition of power and also that the election should be litigated. 

This is episode 1 of my podcast. 

Check out my Podcast: Finding Ideas | The Colton Kirby Show

Make Sure to Like and Subscribe!
